timeline.message:
Issue #4903 - catch Throwable instead of RuntimeException

Signed-off-by: Lachlan Roberts <lachlan@webtide.com>

timeline.bodyHTML:
Suggested change
catch (Throwable t)
catch (DeploymentException e)
{
throw e;
}
catch (Throwable t)
{
throw new DeploymentException(t.getMessage(), t);
}
